column4: I had similar issues, random things (apps and processes) not working after upgrade.  I opened up terminal and typed "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade" without quotes and <enter> and after the updates 12.10 is way better now.
i did the update adn upgrade they are uptodate

Ah... When I went from 11.10 to 12.04 (I think) I bought a game I forgot the name, but it wasn't compatible with 12.04 even though it ran in 11.10.  I assumed it was an issue with the game... Vendor could not get me back working so I had to stop playing. :(
noooooooooo i need sl :(  last time i did soem change in  .conf file but i forgot waht i did there
